option.bettercoppergolem.shulker_and_bun: Enable sorting shulker boxes and bundles based on their content and color
option.bettercoppergolem.ignore_color.in: Completely ignore color of shulker boxes and bundles when sorting
Enabled - will not consider color of the shulkers when placing them into a chest
Disabled - all dyed shulkers will be sorted by color only, the non-dyed ones will still be sorted by content
option.bettercoppergolem.allow_individua: Allow matching items with inventories of containers within chests
Enabled - will consider container contents within chests when checking if the item belongs in a chest
option.bettercoppergolem.allow_inserting: Allow inserting items into containers within chests
option.bettercoppergolem.max_chest_check: Maximum ammount of copper golems will check before going idle
option.bettercoppergolem.max_held_item_s: Maximum ammount of items copper golems can hold
